block.p: KAVALER-Alvinds. 73, died on June 4, 2000, after an extraordinarily courageous and unrelenting quarter-century struggle with multiple sclerosis. Mr. Kavaler's family would like to thank all the medical professionals who shared their expertise and offered support through the years. Funeral services will be held June 5, 2000, at 1 PM, in the Chapel of the Weinstein Morturary, 640 Farmington Ave, Hartford, CT. Memorial contributions may be made to the Multiple Sclerosis Society - Connecticut Chapter, 705 North Mountain Rd, Suite G102, Newington, CT 06111.
